MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the KA6 area of Patna. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 5:55pm. Our engineers have arrived onsite at the Carnshalloch Avenue substation to investigate the fault and the team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 9pm. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 6:48pm on Tuesday, 27 October 2020
